abstract: Liberian Pres Ellen Johnson Sirleaf calls on United States to maintain assistance against continuing Ebola crisis.
lead_paragraph: President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf of Liberia praised the American efforts to fight the virus, which have helped to nearly eliminate new cases.

headline.main: Liberia’s President Urges U.S. to Continue Ebola Aid
